turns.text: So whats the conditions like in Dallas
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Well uh in Dallas I I havent seen air pollution quite on quite on level that we had in Denver I grew up in Denver and and Ive lived there most of my life and we used to have those uh you know the posted warning days Uh however in Colorado now they have the emissions control law which has really cut down - probably only once every couple of years do we ever have pollution so bad that they have to po- post warnings now you know as far as health concerns
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Uh due to that emi- the the emissions uh uh control on the vehicles seems that all of our all of our uh smog was caused by vehicles rather than industry
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Wisconsin has law in which we need to take our cars in every year when we apply for new license tag --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and they are tested for uh their pollution control equipment and if they dont qualify then they have to take it to mechanic and have it gone over and then verify that it it is drivable
So theyve theyve tried to do lot of that --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and I thi- - you know there seem to be at least in certain little pockets - and we were talking earlier about Madison --
-- Madison has one of the nicest uh bike uh road uh sharing programs of of any city in Wisconsin --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and all Wisconsin has probably the most extensive number of uh bike trails for recreational use --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And there is real promotion of of biking --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- but um there are still lot of people who insist on on driving their own automobiles --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- uh to go everywhere I find that little irritating because --
-- I dont think its always so necessary

Yeah yeah it it becomes uh - maybe to you and I who have grown up in some in uh uh some more beautiful parts of the country uh I think that that uh we become little more aware uh rather quickly of of whats happening with air pollution and how uh how horrible it really is Um I I notice people in in Dallas seem to say Well sure theres air pollution but you know really how bad is how bad could this problem really be
